dedup_detail.stage_1_notes: 38 URL exact matches against existing database (mostly arXiv papers from 01-30 scan, Federal Register docs from 02-02, and previously indexed expansion source items)
dedup_detail.stage_2_notes: 12 title-similar items caught: 6 near-identical TechCrunch variants, 3 Federal Register re-postings, 3 UN News updates of previously covered stories
dedup_detail.stage_3_notes: 4 semantically duplicate items: 2 arXiv papers covering overlapping topics with existing DB entries, 1 Nature/Science cross-coverage, 1 IEEE/TechCrunch cross-coverage on neurotech regulation
dedup_detail.stage_4_notes: 2 entity-overlap items: SpaceX-xAI merger covered by both TechCrunch and Hacker News with same entity constellation

new_signals.title: SpaceX Acquires xAI, Creating World's Most Valuable Private Company
new_signals.abstract: SpaceX acquires xAI, creating the world's most valuable private company and paving the way for space-based data centers.

new_signals.title: OpenAI Launches New macOS App for Agentic Coding (Codex)
new_signals.abstract: OpenAI releases standalone macOS app for Codex integrating agentic coding practices, escalating AI developer tools competition.

new_signals.title: Notepad++ Supply Chain Compromise: Chinese Government Hackers Hijacked Updates
new_signals.abstract: State-sponsored hackers compromised Notepad++ software update mechanism for months, delivering tainted software to users via supply chain attack.

new_signals.title: Snowflake Multi-Year AI Deals Signal Enterprise AI Partnership Consolidation
new_signals.abstract: Snowflake signs multi-year deals with OpenAI, Anthropic, and ServiceNow, indicating enterprise AI vendor consolidation trend.

new_signals.title: Coalition Demands Federal Grok Ban Over Nonconsensual Sexual Content
new_signals.abstract: Nonprofits urge US government to suspend Grok in federal agencies after xAI chatbot generated thousands of nonconsensual sexual images.

new_signals.title: Firefox 148 Introduces Toggle to Block All Generative AI Features
new_signals.abstract: Mozilla adds AI controls in Firefox 148 allowing users to disable all generative AI features, reflecting growing user demand for AI opt-out mechanisms.

new_signals.title: Carbon Robotics AI Model Detects and Identifies Plant Species Without Retraining
new_signals.abstract: Agricultural robotics company develops generalizable AI for weed detection without per-crop retraining, advancing precision agriculture.

new_signals.title: AI-Driven Layoffs: Genuine Restructuring or Corporate AI-Washing?
new_signals.abstract: Analysis questions whether workforce reductions attributed to AI represent genuine restructuring or corporate justification strategy.

new_signals.title: Indonesia Conditionally Lifts Ban on xAI's Grok Following Malaysia and Philippines
new_signals.abstract: Indonesia follows Malaysia and Philippines in conditionally lifting Grok bans, signaling emerging Southeast Asian AI regulatory convergence.

new_signals.title: China Regulates Hidden Car Door Handles for Safety (Effective 2027)
new_signals.abstract: China issues safety rule on vehicle door handle design standards effective January 2027, setting precedent for EV safety regulation.

new_signals.title: AI Truth Crisis: Verification Tools Failing to Counter AI-Generated Misinformation
new_signals.abstract: Analysis reveals AI-generated content dupes public and shapes beliefs even when exposed as false; verification tools failing systematically.

new_signals.title: EV Battery Landscape 2026: Sodium-Ion, Solid-State, and Chinese CATL Dominance
new_signals.abstract: Sodium-ion batteries, solid-state developments, and Chinese CATL dominance reshape global EV manufacturing landscape in 2026.

new_signals.title: Deepfake Marketplace Civitai Enables Bespoke Nonconsensual AI Images of Real Women
new_signals.abstract: Stanford/Indiana University research: Civitai hosts deepfake models targeting women, 90% of requests depicting female subjects, raising urgent ethical concerns.

new_signals.title: DHS Uses Google Veo 3 and Adobe Firefly AI for Immigration Enforcement Videos
new_signals.abstract: DHS confirmed using Google Veo 3 and Adobe Firefly video generators for creating immigration enforcement content shared publicly.

new_signals.title: Vitalism Movement Gains Political Influence in Life Extension Advocacy
new_signals.abstract: Vitalism movement and longevity enthusiasts gaining political influence, with supporters positioned in Trump administration healthcare roles.

new_signals.title: FAA Mandates 25-Hour Cockpit Voice Recorder for New Aircraft Production
new_signals.abstract: FAA final rule increases cockpit voice recorder duration from 2 to 25 hours for all affected future manufactured aircraft.

new_signals.title: Cook Inlet Offshore Oil and Gas Lease Sale Under 'One Big Beautiful Bill Act'
new_signals.abstract: Interior Department announces bid opening for offshore oil and gas lease blocks in Cook Inlet following new statutory sale requirements.

new_signals.title: NCI Genomic Data Commons Expanding Data Submission Framework
new_signals.abstract: NIH publishes proposed data collection for National Cancer Institute's Genomic Data Commons, expanding genomic data infrastructure.

new_signals.title: CFTC Position Limits Rule Information Collection Review
new_signals.abstract: CFTC announces comment opportunity on position limits rule collection, maintaining oversight of speculative trading limits.

new_signals.title: Antidumping/Countervailing Duty Sunset Reviews: Trade Protection Renewal
new_signals.abstract: Commerce Department automatically initiates five-year sunset reviews of antidumping and countervailing duty orders.

new_signals.title: WHO Launches First Global Guide on Mental Health and Stigma for Neglected Tropical Diseases
new_signals.abstract: WHO launches first-ever global guide on mental health care and stigma reduction for people affected by neglected tropical diseases.

new_signals.title: Nature Debate: Does AI Already Have Human-Level Intelligence?
new_signals.abstract: Expert commentary in Nature assessing whether modern AI systems have achieved Turing's vision of human-level machine intelligence.

new_signals.title: OpenAI-Backed Merge Labs: Ultrasound Brain-Reading Technology Under Scientific Scrutiny
new_signals.abstract: Critical examination of Merge Labs' brain-reading technology claims using ultrasound, backed by OpenAI. Scientific validation questioned.

new_signals.title: Long-Lived Ion-Ion Entanglement Achieved for Scalable Quantum Repeaters
new_signals.abstract: Nature publishes breakthrough: sustained remote ion-ion entanglement enabling scalable quantum repeaters for long-distance quantum communication.

new_signals.title: China's Elite Scholars Shift Career Patterns: Increasing Domestic Scientific Focus
new_signals.abstract: Nature analysis reveals shifting career patterns among Chinese elite scholars, with increasing domestic focus reducing international collaboration.

new_signals.title: Largest Galaxy Survey Confirms Universe Less Clumpy Than Predicted by Standard Model
new_signals.abstract: Dark Energy Survey findings reveal tensions with standard cosmological models; universe less clumpy than theoretical predictions.

new_signals.title: Health Influencers on Social Media: Spreading Both Awareness and Misinformation
new_signals.abstract: Nature analysis: social media health influencers spread both beneficial health awareness and dubious medical information, creating public health dilemma.

new_signals.title: IEEE Developing P7700 Safety Standard for Consumer Neurotech Products
new_signals.abstract: IEEE Brain community develops P7700 standard for responsible neurotech design, addressing safety and ethics for brain-reading consumer devices.

new_signals.title: AI Regulation Debate: Regulate Use, Not Models — Risk-Based Enforcement Framework
new_signals.abstract: IEEE Spectrum argues for use-based AI regulation at real-world choke points (app stores, payment systems) rather than restricting model development.

new_signals.title: LuSEE-Night: Far Side Lunar Radio Telescope to Detect Cosmic Dark Ages Signals
new_signals.abstract: Firefly Aerospace's Blue Ghost Mission 2 to deliver LuSEE-Night radio telescope to Moon's far side, detecting signals from cosmic Dark Ages.

new_signals.title: Wikipedia at 25: Resistance to AI Innovation Reveals Institutional Conservatism
new_signals.abstract: Wikipedia's community rejected AI-generated article summaries, revealing institutional conservatism and sustainability challenges for volunteer platforms.

new_signals.title: Clean Energy Firms Reframe Messaging Under Trump: Affordability Over Environment
new_signals.abstract: Renewable energy companies reframe messaging around affordability and domestic manufacturing, responding to shifted federal energy policies.

new_signals.title: WHO Warns Global Health Systems 'At Risk' as International Funding Cuts Accelerate
new_signals.abstract: WHO cautions reduced international aid and funding shortfalls undermine worldwide health infrastructure and services.

new_signals.title: UN: Submarine Cable Infrastructure Powers Global Digital Connectivity
new_signals.abstract: UN highlights critical submarine cable infrastructure vulnerability powering global communications, banking, and digital services.

new_signals.title: UN Expert Analysis: Can Workers Compete with AI and Stay Relevant?
new_signals.abstract: UN experts examine strategies for managing employment transitions as AI threatens job displacement and economic inequality.

new_signals.title: IAEA: Ukraine War Remains World's Biggest Threat to Nuclear Safety
new_signals.abstract: IAEA warns sustained combat risks nuclear facility power supplies, escalating dangers as fifth year of Ukraine conflict approaches.

new_signals.title: Gaza Rafah Crossing Reopens After Over One Year Amid 'Massive Trepidation'
new_signals.abstract: Rafah crossing reopens after over one year, generating both optimism and apprehension among aid officials and displaced populations.

new_signals.title: EPA Advances Farmers' Right to Repair Their Own Equipment
new_signals.abstract: EPA advances right-to-repair for farmers, saving repair costs and challenging agricultural equipment manufacturer lock-in practices.

new_signals.title: Nvidia Shares Drop After OpenAI Investment Stalls
new_signals.abstract: Nvidia shares decline after reports that its investment in OpenAI has stalled, signaling AI investment ecosystem tensions.

new_signals.title: Wiz Exposes Moltbook Database: Millions of API Keys Leaked
new_signals.abstract: Security firm Wiz discovers exposed Moltbook database revealing millions of API keys, highlighting systemic cloud security vulnerabilities.

new_signals.title: Google DeepMind Advances AI Benchmarking with Kaggle Game Arena
new_signals.abstract: Google DeepMind launches Game Arena on Kaggle for AI agent benchmarking, advancing competitive AI evaluation methodologies.

new_signals.title: Pew: Confidence in Trump Dips — Only 27% Support All/Most Policies
new_signals.abstract: Pew survey: only 27% of Americans support all or most of Trump's policies (down from previous year), confidence dipping across demographics.

new_signals.title: Pew: Young Adults Increasingly Get News from Social Media Over Traditional Sources
new_signals.abstract: Young adults under 30 increasingly source news from social media, reshaping information distribution and media consumption patterns.

new_signals.title: US Formally Exits Paris Climate Agreement Under Trump
new_signals.abstract: US formally exits Paris Agreement under Trump administration, alongside extreme weather events (Australian heatwaves, US winter storms).

new_signals.title: Chinese Wind Power: Help or Hindrance to Europe's Climate Goals?
new_signals.abstract: Expert debate on Chinese wind turbine manufacturers' role in Europe's renewable energy expansion and 2030 clean energy targets.

new_signals.title: First Chikungunya Vaccine: Serious Side Effects Dim Hopes During Outbreak
new_signals.abstract: First chikungunya vaccine falls short during massive outbreak on French island; serious side effects prompt search for safer alternatives.

new_signals.title: UK Physics Community Faces 30% Funding Cuts in Particle Physics and Astronomy
new_signals.abstract: UK research council to slash funding for particle physics, nuclear physics, and astronomy by 30%, threatening scientific infrastructure.

new_signals.title: Deep-Space Radiation: Shields and Biological Countermeasures for Lunar Missions
new_signals.abstract: Scientists develop radiation shields and biological countermeasures for astronauts as humanity prepares for prolonged lunar missions.

new_signals.title: NASA Releases 2025 Temperature Data Without Mentioning 'Climate Change'
new_signals.abstract: NASA publishes 2025 global temperature data (2nd hottest year) without mentioning climate change, emissions, or global warming — sharp break from Biden-era communications.

new_signals.title: Congress Pushes Back on Trump's 50% NASA Earth Science Cuts
new_signals.abstract: Congress rejects Trump's proposed 50% NASA science cuts; explicitly maintains Goddard Institute for Space Studies climate monitoring lab.
